Choose the best hardware

 

The complementary hardware to use with Adinux toolbox would be a touch screen, a touch kiosk or touch monitor in large size and a 10-inch tablet, or an all-in-one computer. If the appropriate hardware is not accessible, Adinux interactive solution package called Adibox is available for sale, including a touch device with LIDAR technology. Adibox can change any monitor to a touch device and a body gesture sensor (Microsoft Kinect) to use all Adinux apps.
